competitors.name: Plivo
competitors.notes: Founded 2011, offers SMS, Voice, and Carrier APIs with coverage in over 160 countries. Positioned as lower-cost alternative to Twilio

competitors.name: Vonage (Nexmo)
competitors.notes: Comprehensive suite of communication APIs for voice, video, and verification services. 1,600+ global carriers

competitors.name: Bandwidth
competitors.notes: Communications platform with ownership of nationwide IP voice network in US, providing better call quality and reliability

competitors.name: Sinch
competitors.notes: Cloud communications platform founded 2008, offering messaging, voice, and video APIs

competitors.name: MessageBird
competitors.notes: Europe-based omnichannel platform offering SMS, voice, email, WhatsApp and more

competitors.name: Infobip
competitors.notes: Global omnichannel communications platform with enterprise-grade infrastructure for SMS, voice, WhatsApp, email

context: Twilio Inc. is a cloud communications platform company focused on programmable communications, SMS, voice, and customer data. IPO. SMS and voice APIs for developers.
